meta.dc:title: HR 776 ENR: Emergency Medical Services for Children Program Reauthorization Act of 2019
meta.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
meta.dc:creator: Xcential BillDTD to USLM Converter v20200824
meta.property: One Hundred Sixteenth Congress of the United States of America
To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize the Emergency Medical Services for Children program.

main.name: HR776

content.p: To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize the Emergency Medical Services for Children program.

main.enactingFormula: Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the United States of America in Congress assembled,

section.heading: Short title.
section.content: This Act may be cited as the “Emergency Medical Services for Children Program Reauthorization Act of 2019”.

section.heading: Reauthorization of the Emergency Medical Services for Children program.
section.chapeau: Section 1910(d) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 300w–9(d)) is amended—

paragraph.content: by striking “2014, and” and inserting “2014,”; and
by inserting before the period the following: “, and $22,334,000 for each of fiscal years 2020 through 2024”.

signature.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives.
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate.
